response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product is valued at $12,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $11,000. This offer not only provides you with significant savings but also ensures that you receive the best possible solution tailored to your needs. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 11000}
